Moving to JDT for investigation.  The tab with the exception is a tab PDE uses directly from JDT.

I could't reproduce.

JUnitLaunchConfigurationTab.initializeFrom is promised to be called after the page has been created. I'm not sure it should be prepared to work on disposed pages.

Moving to Platform/Debug

I cannot reproduce either...

Darin, can you attach the configuration in question?

I can tell you from past PDE experience, we rarely are able to reproduce widget disposed errors.  So to prevent future error, before setting the value of a Text or other widget, we check to see if the widget is disposed.  If it is, then we don't touch the widget.  This prevents future errors from being logged.
that is a very good policy :) Although we have found a few sync errors in the launch dialog tracking down issues like this...so it never hurts to have a look-see
